definition: to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: The boundary condition of restriction and the natural condition of variation for the virtual principle of displacement are given too.
sentences.chinese: 明確了虛位移原理的變分約束條件和變分自然條件。

sentences.english: The influence of bound condition on the trend of foliation and high stress area.
sentences.chinese: 約束條件與層理分佈和應力集中區的關係。

sentences.english: Now, we have some constraints here.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們有一些約束條件。

sentences.english: So we have four variables, two constraints.
sentences.chinese: 那麼我們有四個變量，兩個約束條件。

sentences.english: Aerodynamical and mechanical constraints are considered in the problem formulation.
sentences.chinese: 求優中考慮了多種氣動與機械約束條件。

sentences.english: Our constraint is that we are the coexistence point.
sentences.chinese: 我們的約束條件是必須在共存點上。

sentences.english: And maybe you give it a set of constraints.
sentences.chinese: 你可能給了它一系列的約束條件。

sentences.english: The constraint conditions to realize the vector control of 3DM are presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先給出實現三維電動機矢量控制的約束條件。

sentences.english: It is discuss the control relation and control term of the work procedure.
sentences.chinese: 討論了該工作流程的控制關係及約束條件等。

sentences.english: Possibly an empty set of constraints.
sentences.chinese: 約束條件得出的也可能是空值。

sentences.english: And then we add the constraints.
The spatial relationship of the sub-area was used as constraint conditions to correct the result.
sentences.chinese: 將各子區位置分佈關係用作匹配結果的約束條件。

sentences.english: Global path planning allows finding optimal paths under multi-constraints.
sentences.chinese: 全局路徑規劃可在多種約束條件下找出最優路徑。

sentences.english: Well, here we have to use the constraint.
sentences.chinese: 這裏，我們必須使用約束條件。

sentences.english: The constraint has to change. I've added a constraint.
